name: My Darling Vivian (2020)
description: \n                    In 1951, Catholic schoolgirl Vivian Liberto meets handsome Air Force cadet Johnny Cash at her local San Antonio, Texas skating rink.  Their whirlwind summer romance lays the foundation for a feverish three-year-long correspondence while Johnny is stationed in Germany.  Thousands of letters later, the two marry upon his return in 1954.  Within a year, a career blossoms and a family is started.  By 1961, Johnny Cash is a household name, number one on the music charts, and perpetually on tour. \n
